name: 人気があるよ
description:
The pop-idol Idoruko Idoruyama is late for a radio appearance.  Help her get there on time.

A game made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40. Theme: "The more you have, the worse it is"

Controls
Move:  AWSD or Arrows
(You will also need a pen and some scrap paper)

Credits
Game: Jordgubben
Level Muzak: Char*
Jingles + Spellcheck: Li'l päpz
Tester: Genma

Known issues
- Known not to work in some older version of Firefox
- Can get locked in by groupies
